summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.9°C) and outside temperature (down 1.7°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.4 mm), light levels (up 3084 lux), and cloud levels (up 410 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1345 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5432 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 409.9m lower than yesterday, 954.1m lower than past week, 1344.9m lower than past month.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 860m to 3110m and averaged 1463.4m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable. Chance of light rain, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
